author: mandrenguyen
body:
Expected beam conditions for the pp run at 5 TeV that will take place in about 4 weeks.
The GEN-SIM production will be in the same release used for 13 TeV, so I will also add this into 71X.
I can also add this in CMSSW8, if we're no longer forward porting from 76X.
As usual, we will iterate with ppd/pdmv to get the matching reco BS in the GT.
title: Adding a vertex smearing configution for pp at 5 TeV, based on latest info from the LHC
